name: Magic Cat Match: Swipe & Blast
description:
Get your paws on this furry clever magic match-3 puzzle adventure!

When Milo the cat and his dog friend Oliver saw their guardian get sucked into the magic world of toys, they could not believe their eyes!
They need your help to find their guardian and bring her back to the real world.
Get your paws ready to swipe and match blocks, solve magic cat puzzles and reach the purrr-fect score!


FEATURES:

- Challenging match 3 puzzles!
Solve various fun and challenging puzzles to help Milo and Oliver find their guardian.

- Hours of furry puzzle fun!
Hundreds of levels with unique puzzles will keep you coming back for more!

- Cute and colorful graphics!
Milo and Oliver are sucked into a world of magic and fun, where everything is cute and colorful.

- Play with your furry friends!
The cute and furry cat Milo and his equally furry dog friend Oliver are counting on you to help them!

- Magic boosters and bonuses!
Boosters and daily bonuses help you on your way if you get stuck.



Magic Cat Match offers hours of furry fun with match 3 puzzles in a cute and colorful world of magic.
Join Milo the cat and Oliver the dog for a paws-itively blast of a time!
Get your paws on this magical match 3 puzzle game today!!
